thread.title: Harrison
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by Harrison

author: Harrison
title: Harrison
text: I rent a car from Cairns. the staff is terrible and they fraud me use the exist minor damage. they took $3000 immediately from my card. Please be careful to sign any contract with them and it's very important to take a video of car when you take and return the car as evidence. They are rubbish! I am going to report to Fair community and maybe go to Small Claims Court. I don't want to accept this unfairness.
